oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ethical principles and the revision of organic rules
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted
Schmid, Otto
Padel, Susanne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Strong ethical principles are seen as a tool to evaluating the development of organic agriculture so that corrections can be made where they are considered necessary. This report explains how the EU project, Organic Revision, is expected to do just that.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted; Schmid, Otto and Padel, Susanne (2005) Ethical principles and the revision of organic rules. The Organic Standard, 51, pp. 8-11.
